item.title: Exploring JavaScript Prototypes
item.description:
Redirects to legacy blog post.

My intention with this post is to arm our developers with enough information around JavaScript prototypes to know when they are the right tool for the job as opposed to other constructs when considering how to create polymorphic JavaScript that’s performant and easy to maintain.

item.title: JavaScript Object Creation Patterns
item.description:
Redirects to legacy blog post.

What are the differences in creating an object by way of simple function invocation, vs using a constructor vs creating an object using the object literal notation vs function application?

item.title: JavaScript Coding Standards and Guidelines
item.description:
Redirects to legacy blog post.

This is the current set of coding standards and guidelines I use when I’m coding in the JavaScript language. I thought it would be good to share so others could get use out of them also, and maybe start a discussion as to amendments / changes they see that could be useful?
